DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: Uses cached version if chainid is unchanged from construction.

approve(address,uint256).details: override Solmate's ERC721 approve so approve() and permit() share the _approve method The zero address indicates there is no approved address Throws error unless `msg.sender` is the current NFT owner, or an authorized operator of the current owner.

params.id: The tokenId of the NFT to approve

permit(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,b.details: payable so it can be multicalled with NATIVE related actions

params.deadline: The deadline timestamp by which the call must be mined for the approve to work
params.signature: Concatenated data from a valid secp256k1 signature from the holder, i.e. abi.encodePacked(r, s, v)
params.spender: The account that is being approved
params.tokenId: The ID of the token that is being approved for spending

permitForAll(address,address,bool,uint25.details: payable so it can be multicalled with NATIVE related actions

params.approved: The permission to set on the operator
params.deadline: The deadline timestamp by which the call must be mined for the approve to work
params.operator: The address that will be set as an operator for the owner
params.owner: The address that is setting the operator
params.signature: Concatenated data from a valid secp256k1 signature from the holder, i.e. abi.encodePacked(r, s, v)

revokeNonce(uint256).details: Used in cases where a valid nonce has not been broadcasted onchain, and the owner wants to revoke the validity of the noncepayable so it can be multicalled with native-token related actions

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Emits the ApprovalForAll event. The contract MUST allow multiple operators per owner.Override Solmate's ERC721 setApprovalForAll so setApprovalForAll() and permit() share the _approveForAll method

params.approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params.operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: Returns the domain separator for the current chain.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Change or reaffirm the approved address for an NFT

nonces(address,uint256).notice: mapping of nonces consumed by each address, where a nonce is a single bit on the 256-bit bitmap

permit(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Approve of a specific token ID for spending by spender via signature

permitForAll(address,address,bool,uint25.notice: Set an operator with full permission to an owner's tokens via signature

revokeNonce(uint256).notice: Revoke a nonce by spending it, preventing it from being used again

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of `msg.sender`'s assets
